column4: also, is there a way to change the order of the window buttons in the maximized state?
i don't like close-minimize-maximize, i'd rather have close-maximize-minimize
at one time Ubuntu-tweak let you reorder them
from whative googled. you cant reorder them in the top panel. but you can in the window title
i already changed it in the titlebar
I did see some indicator-applet mentioned that  did the same feature. it may have been more changeable. check the webupd8 postings - it was either this week or last week i saw it mentioned
